ImageFunction.fillRect

Function/Meaning
Fill Rectangle
Type
Method of the ImageFunction class
Syntax
fillRect(bmp, value, rect=null, isalpha=true, cliprect=null)
Arguments
bmp Specifies the Bitmap object to be filled.
value Specifies the color or value to fill with.
The meaning of this value changes depending on the value of isalpha.
true : Specify the opacity and color in 0xAARRGGBB format. Both the main image and the mask will be filled.
false : Specify the color in 0xRRGGBB format.
rect Specifies the rectangle to fill as a Rect object in pixels (relative to the image position).
If omitted, the entire image is targeted.
isalpha Specifies whether to use the alpha channel.
cliprect Specifies the clipping region as a Rect object (relative to the Bitmap's image position).
If omitted, the entire image is targeted.
Return Value
None (void)
Description
Fills the specified rectangle of the Bitmap image using the specified method.
